title: Amazon Races to Beat Nvidia and Google with Trainium3 —AI Costs May Finally Drop
description: Amazon unveiled its Trainium3 chip and the multimodal Nova 2 Omni model at re:Invent, intensifying the AI race.
content:
The escalating costs of artificial intelligence are straining innovators worldwide. At the heart of this expense are the highly coveted, powerful chips required to train massive AI models.
For years… [+6905 chars]
